name: prompt-learning-server
description: AI Image Generation API - Express & Cloudflare Workers Compatible

scripts.worker:deploy:all: npm run worker:deploy:main && npm run worker:deploy:batch1 && npm run worker:deploy:batch2 && npm run worker:deploy:batch3 && npm run worker:deploy:batch4
scripts.worker:deploy:batch1: npm run worker:deploy:server1 && npm run worker:deploy:server2 && npm run worker:deploy:server3 && npm run worker:deploy:server4 && npm run worker:deploy:server5
scripts.worker:deploy:batch2: npm run worker:deploy:server6 && npm run worker:deploy:server7 && npm run worker:deploy:server8 && npm run worker:deploy:server9 && npm run worker:deploy:server10
scripts.worker:deploy:batch3: npm run worker:deploy:server11 && npm run worker:deploy:server12 && npm run worker:deploy:server13 && npm run worker:deploy:server14 && npm run worker:deploy:server15
scripts.worker:deploy:batch4: npm run worker:deploy:server16 && npm run worker:deploy:server17 && npm run worker:deploy:server18 && npm run worker:deploy:server19 && npm run worker:deploy:server20
